blurb.text: With D.A.N.G.E.R. (Live Modular Set), Zena C. (Downtempo), visuals by Lightbody. Kickoff event celebrating sound design + spatial design.
An evening of ambient textures and experimental loops exploring memory and reincarnation in sound.
Immersive lighting installation accompanies the set.
Pulsating techno and kinetic visuals—oscillations between rhythm and light.
A night built for movement.
Outdoor showcase blending local visual artists with live electronic sets.
Art, music, and community intersect in the streets.
Bass-driven night featuring DJs pushing the boundaries of house, drum & bass, and experimental club sounds.
Cross-disciplinary performance merging dance and live electronic composition.
A collaboration of movement and sound design.
Darkwave, industrial, and immersive horror visuals for a night of spectral soundscapes.
